response_time.Description: Latency of button press after auditory stimulus

Levels.cue: auditory cue stimulus played at beginning of the trial
Levels.error_of_commission: erroneous participant keypress after no-go stimulus
Levels.error_feedback_tone: error feedback tone signaling erroneous keypresses

Levels.x1: auditory temporal cue (warning stimulus) presented at the beginning of each trial
Levels.x3: error feedback tone signaling slow responses
Levels.x4: auditory no-go stimulus presented only in go/no-go task condition
Levels.x6: keypress after no-go stimulus - error of commission
Levels.x7: error feedback tone presented after the participants committed an error - responded after cue presentation
Levels.x11: error feedback tone presented after the participants committed an error
